channel.title: Basic Safezone(s)
channel.description:
Click [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,55034.0.html]here[/url] to learn how to make ::range a safezone. It's the same idea if you wan't to make a different area a safezone, just remove all the coords in that tut and replace them with the corners of the area you wan't to be a safe zone.
Your immaturity and stupid poll stopped you from getting good advice by, Aftermath. Instead I'm the one who helps, sorry I couldn't explain what to do in more detail.
I made this for Zenzie. I hope it helped, I did try to post it in your other topic. It got locked though, bravo. ;)
Edit : Changed it a little bit so it's easier to understand. (I hope)
